Total 2021 to 2022 allocation £1,187,538

For more information on non-levy apprenticeship allocations and how they are calculated see the 19+ allocations technical guidance for 2022 to 2023.

Changes to your allocation

We can reduce or remove your allocation if there's evidence that public funds are at risk. You must follow the apprenticeship funding rules. Allocation statements are not legally binding. They do not create any legal obligation against the Secretary of State for Education, acting through the Education and Skills Funding Agency (ESFA).

Business cases

You can submit a business case if you have given incorrect data to the ESFA and this has affected your funding allocation. For example, a mistake in your R04 return.
